name: Tractor Cannon
flavor_text: Property of Ishtar Collective. WARNING: Gravity propulsor beam can cause serious injury or even death.

frame.name: Repulsor Force
frame.description: This weapon emits a powerful impulse that pushes enemies away, suppresses their abilities, and makes them more vulnerable to all incoming damage.

perks.description:
Weighty barrel extension.
  •  Increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed
  •  Moderately controls recoil
perks.name: Extended Barrel

perks.description:
Constrains recoil for every bolt.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Particle Repeater

perks.description: Damaging an opponent temporarily increases speed and handling.
perks.name: The Scientific Method

perks.description:
This weapon has a versatile dual-purpose stock.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Composite Stock
